title: Onion - Tomato 🍅 Raita | Yogurt Dip| Side Dish
content:
Side Dish: Raita Servings: 6 Duration: 5 minutes An easy, simple and yummy side dish can pair with Vegetable Biryani , Kuska Biryani  , Tomato 🍅 Bath , Pulao and any other Indian rice preparations. It’s low-fat Indian yogurt dip makes a great side to cool down the spice level of curry and also refreshing your meal. Let’s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Curd/ yogurt - 200 ml
  • Onion - Finely chopped - 1/2 cup
  • Tomato - Finely chopped - 1/2 cup
  • Cilantro - 1/4 cup - chopped
  • Salt - 3/4 tsp
  • Green chillies - 2 - Finely chopped
Procedure:
  • Add curd in a bowl ( whisk it )
  • Next add rest of the ingredients, mix well and transfer to a serving bowl
  • Serve it with Pav Bhaji Masala Veg Biryani , Bisi Bele Bath or any spicy biryani
  • Happy Cooking 🙂 Enjoy your day 👍
